analyzed: ācārya nāgārjuna pāda viracitam
ārya dharmadhātu garbha vivaraṇam
bhāratīya bhāṣāyām ārya dharmadhātu garbha vivaraṇam
bhoṭa bhāṣāyām phak pā chos kyiyiṅ kyiñiṅ poī nama para ḍelapā
namaḥ ratnatrayāya

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evaṃvādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
iti uktam
atra ye dharmāḥ iti saptabhiḥ prakāraiḥ avagantavyāḥ

original: tadyathā- vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśaḥ vedanā jātirjarāmaraṇamiti /
analyzed: tat yathā vijñānam nāma rūpam ṣaṣ āyatanam sparśaḥ vedanā jātiḥ jarā maraṇam iti

original: ime dharmāḥ api pañcabhyaḥ prakārebhya utpadyanta iti 'hetuprabhavāḥ' ityuktam /
analyzed: ime dharmāḥ api pañcabhyaḥ prakārebhyaḥ utpadyante iti hetu prabhavāḥ iti uktam
ke te pañca hetavaḥ
avidyā tṛṣṇā upādānam saṃskārāḥ bhavaḥ ca iti

original: saptavidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ ca teṣāṃ hetūnāṃ nirodhastāvad 'hetuṃ teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaḥ' ityādinābhihitaḥ /
analyzed: saptavidhānām dharmāṇām pañca prakārāṇām ca teṣām hetūnām nirodhaḥ tāvat hetum teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ ityādinā abhihitaḥ
saḥ eva upaśamaḥ mokṣaḥ nirvāṇam iti
sa ca kena uktaḥ
tathāgataḥ hi avadat
iti
tena upadiṣṭaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa tathā kathitam
arthānām yathā sthitiḥ tathā yathāvat
avabodhāt tathāgataḥ iti ucyate
vastūnām yathā sthitiḥ
tasyāḥ a bhrānta tayāḥ anyebhyaḥ deśanāt vā tathāgataḥ
evaṃvidhaḥ yaḥ deśakaḥ

original: yaścaivaṃ svayaṃ bodhakaḥ śravaṇaśīlayuktaśca sa 'evaṃvādī' (mahāśramaṇaḥ) ityuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca evam svayam bodhakaḥ śravaṇa śīla yuktaḥ ca saḥ evaṃvādī mahā śramaṇaḥ iti uktaḥ
mahān śabdaḥ pradhāna adbhuta parama pravara paryāyaḥ

original: yo vādī vidvān vīraḥ tapasvī mahotsāhaḥ tīvravīryaḥ adbhutakarmakāri ca bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ vādī vidvān vīraḥ tapasvī mahā utsāhaḥ tīvra vīryaḥ adbhuta karma kāri ca bhavati
saḥ eva mahān iti
sa aśeṣa jñātavyānām jñānāt vidvān
aśeṣa kleśānām damane samartha tvāt vīraḥ
śīlasya samyak bhāvanayā tapasvī
guṇa ādiṣu a parikhedāt mahā utsāhaḥ

original: yasya śiraḥ kapālaṃ vā agninā dīptam,
analyzed: yasya śiraḥ kapālam vai agninā dīptam

original: tadavān iva 'tīvravīryaḥ tathā adbhutadharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkāritvād 'adbhutakarmakārī' iti /
analyzed: tadavān iva tīvra vīryaḥ tathā adbhuta dharmāṇām sākṣātkāri tvāt adbhuta karma kārī iti
etādṛśaḥ eva mahān iti ucyate
śramaṇaḥ iti pāpānām kleśānām ca upaśamāt śramaṇaḥ
sarva pāpānām prakṣālanāt brāhmaṇaḥ
kleśa klamatha parivarjanāt śramaṇaḥ svakīya mala apasāraṇāt pravrajitaḥ iti
iti evaṃvidhaiḥ guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ iti
bhagavatā buddhena uktaḥ iti anena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
evam eva duḥkha samudaya nirodha mārga satyeṣu api yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
avidyā hetoḥ saṃskārāḥ
iti ārabhya jarā maraṇa paryantam svabhāvataḥ siddham
kartāram an apekṣya samutpādaḥ tāvat anulomaḥ
avidyā ādi hetūnām nivṛtteḥ avabodhaḥ pratilomaḥ iti uktaḥ

original: avidyānivṛtteḥ saṃskārādayo nivartanta ityupadeśakārakatvāt (bhagavān buddha eva)
analyzed: avidyā nivṛtteḥ saṃskāra ādayaḥ nivartante iti upadeśa kāraka tvāt bhagavān buddhaḥ eva
mahāśramaṇaḥ iti
ācārya nāgārjuna pāda viracitam ārya dharmadhātu garbha vivaraṇam samāptam

original: bhāratīyopādhyāyena jñānagarbheṇa 'mahālocāvā vande palacekmahābhāgena cānūdya saṃśodhya ca sunirṇītam /
analyzed: bhāratīya upādhyāyena jñānagarbheṇa mahālocāvā vande palacek mahābhāgena ca anūdya saṃśodhya ca su nirṇītam
bhavatu sarva maṅgalam
